definition[0]: a man who people in the Christian, Jewish, or Muslim religion believe has been sent by God to lead them and teach them their religion
definition[1]: someone who claims that they know what will happen in the future
note[0]: false prophet (=someone whose claims about the future are not true)
definition[2]: someone who introduces and spreads a new idea
example[1]: Gandhi was the prophet of non-violent protest.
definition[3]: Muhammad, who established the Muslim religion
